https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eoJX65JIFNOx6O1ZUKgzFJHJI95.jpg When Bella discovers that funding for her dog rescue centre is discontinued, she turns to JR, a soldier who quickly becomes attached to one of her rescues, a German Shepard named, Indie. A Tail of Love
